public interface HttpStack

An HTTP stack abstraction.

Method Summary
 org.apache.http.HttpResponse performRequest(Request<?> request, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> additionalHeaders)
          Performs an HTTP request with the given parameters.
 

Method Detail

performRequest

org.apache.http.HttpResponse performRequest(Request<?> request,
                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> additionalHeaders)
                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                   AuthFailureError
Performs an HTTP request with the given parameters.

A GET request is sent if request.getPostBody() == null. A POST request is sent otherwise, and the Content-Type header is set to request.getPostBodyContentType().

Parameters:
request - the request to perform
additionalHeaders - additional headers to be sent together with Request.getHeaders()
Returns:
the HTTP response
Throws:
java.io.IOException
AuthFailureError
